availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Rufus M. Towns (LaRue County, Kentucky, laborer.)

body.p: LaRue County, Kentucky, laborer. Kentucky native. Son of Thomas Towns and Jane Towns. Attended school in Green County, Kentucky, in 1850. Laborer in LaRue County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 2, p. 137A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, LaRue County, p. 294.
